snippet: Nearly one in three Medicare recipients had an operation in their last year, and nearly one in 10 in their last week.
lead_paragraph: Nearly one in three Medicare recipients had an operation in their last year, and nearly one in 10 in their last week.

headline.main: Surgery Rate Late in Life Surprises Researchers
headline.print_headline: Surgery Rate Late in Life Surprises Researchers
headline.seo: Lancet Report Cites Rate of Late-in-Life Surgery
